short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances GitHub PR reviews by generating descriptive summaries and providing full-context code change analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub PR Buddy streamlines your pull request workflow with two powerful features:

üîπ Prepare Summary
- Instantly format your PR changes for AI analysis
- Get well-structured summaries by simply pasting into your preferred AI assistant
- Perfect for writing PR descriptions, documentation, or change summaries

üîπ Explore Changes
- Browse changed files in a clean, collapsible sidebar
- Click any file to copy its complete context:
  ‚Ä¢ Full file contents
  ‚Ä¢ Detailed changes
  ‚Ä¢ File statistics
- Ideal for thorough code reviews or getting AI insights about specific changes

‚ú® Key Benefits:
- Save time on PR documentation
- Get consistent, well-structured summaries
- Streamline code review process
- Easily share context with team members
- Seamless integration with AI assistants

üõ†Ô∏è Features:
- GitHub-style interface
